1.title: SMX Advanced session recap: Mobile-first and AMP
1.text: Contributor Patrick Stox recaps an advanced SEO session where speakers shared how to perform audits in a mobile-first world and tactics to maximize the effectiveness of your AMP content.

2.title: Google Speed Update is now being released to all users
2.text: After six months of preparation, the Google Speed Update is now rolling out. It only impacts the mobile search rankings of the slowest of sites on the internet.

3.title: Be careful what content you cut from your site
3.text: Contributor Janet Driscoll Miller helps you determine how to make your website lean and mean without eliminating big traffic drivers.

4.title: Mobile is taking over the customer journey
4.text: Contributor Brian Solis reminds us that mobile success requires a lot more than just having an app or mobile site.

5.title: Google’s URL inspection tool now available for all users
5.text: After launching this tool 15 days ago, it is finally now available for everyone to use within the new Google Search Console.
